data.question: What is the empirical formula of Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4?

What is the maximum temperature up to which Tb2(BDC)3 remains stable?
What is the pore volume of Tb2(BDC)3?
Is the dehydration process of Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4 reversible?
Does Tb2(BDC)3 show sorption for N2(g) and CO2(g)?
What is the decay constant (k) for Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4?
What is the coordination number of Tb in Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4?
What is the role of triethylamine in the synthesis of Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4?
Is Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4 soluble in water?

What is the volume (V) of the unit cell of Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4?
Does the structure of Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4 contain protonated BDC?
What is the luminescence lifetime of Tb2(BDC)3·(NH3)4?

Is the structure of Tb2(BDC)3·(NH3)4 similar to the as-synthesized solid?
What is the role of water ligands in the structure of Tb2(BDC)3·(H2O)4?
data.answer: They act as terminal ligands to Tb.
